text:
@PressSec @realDonaldTrump Utterly tone-deaf, if not egregious gas-lighting. 

S. Korea - 1st case Jan. 20; Total cases of 10,752 & total deaths of 244 as of April 28.
US - 1st case Jan. 20; Total cases of 1,002,498 & total deaths of 57,533 as of April 28.

This 👇 explains why!
